statements: SELECT * FROM reminder_system
SELECT bill_name, bill_amount FROM reminder_system WHERE payment_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM reminder_system WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT bill_name, due_date, payment_status FROM reminder_system ORDER BY bill_amount DESC
SELECT reminder_id, bill_name FROM reminder_system WHERE bill_amount > 100
SELECT reminder_id, bill_name, bill_amount, due_date, payment_status FROM reminder_system WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY due_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM reminder_system WHERE bill_amount > 100 ORDER BY bill_amount ASC;
SELECT bill_name, due_date FROM reminder_system WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01' AND payment_status = FALSE;
SELECT COUNT(reminder_id) AS total_reminders FROM reminder_system WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(bill_amount) AS average_bill_amount FROM reminder_system WHERE payment_status = TRUE AND bill_name LIKE '%electricity%';
SELECT * FROM bill_reminders;
SELECT bill_name, due_date FROM bill_reminders WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT reminder_id, bill_name, due_date, amount FROM bill_reminders ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT bill_name, paid_amount FROM bill_reminders JOIN payment_history ON bill_reminders.reminder_id = payment_history.reminder_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM bill_reminders WHERE due_date > '2022-08-30';
SELECT bill_name, amount FROM bill_reminders WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT b.bill_name, p.paid_amount, p.payment_date FROM bill_reminders b JOIN payment_history p ON b.reminder_id = p.reminder_id WHERE p.paid_amount > 5000 AND b.due_date < '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT b.bill_name, SUM(p.paid_amount) AS total_paid_amount FROM bill_reminders b JOIN payment_history p ON b.reminder_id = p.reminder_id GROUP BY b.bill_name HAVING total_paid_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_paid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT bill_name, due_date FROM reminders ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT bill_name, reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, bill_name, due_date FROM reminders ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT r.bill_name, p.amount, p.payment_date FROM reminders r JOIN payments p ON r.id = p.reminder_id;
SELECT r.bill_name, p.amount, p.payment_date FROM reminders r INNER JOIN payments p ON r.id = p.reminder_id WHERE p.amount > 1000;
SELECT r.bill_name, a.action, a.timestamp FROM reminders r LEFT JOIN audit_log a ON r.id = a.id ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT bill_name, due_date FROM reminders WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT payment_id, reminder_id, amount_paid FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, action_type, log_date FROM logs WHERE action_type = 'Update';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT reminder_id, bill_name, amount FROM reminders WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT r.reminder_id, r.bill_name, u.username FROM reminders r JOIN users u ON r.reminder_id = u.user_id
SELECT * FROM payments p JOIN users u ON p.paid_by_user_id = u.user_id WHERE amount_paid < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT r.bill_name, p.amount_paid, l.action_description FROM reminders r JOIN payments p ON r.reminder_id = p.reminder_id JOIN logs l ON r.reminder_id = l.log_id WHERE p.amount_paid > 500
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT bill_name, amount, due_date FROM bills WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_text FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT notification_text, notification_date FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT bill_id, bill_name, amount, due_date, user_id FROM bills WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_text, reminder_date, bill_id FROM reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid, payment_date, bill_id FROM payment_history WHERE amount_paid < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, notification_date, user_id FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 2;
